title: Awilda The Shield Maiden
body:
Awilda
Tank
The Shield Maiden
Freljord
Health: 525 (+95 per level)
Attack Damage: 58.55 (+4 per level)
Attack Speed: 0.625 (+3% per level)
Movement Speed: 340
Health Regen: 8 (+0.9 per level)
Armor :30.5(+3.5 per level)
Magic Resist:30 (+1.25 per level)



Abilities

Passive
Blood-Lust
Awilda gains an additional 1% movement speed towards enemies that are missing 2% Health  


(Q) Cut Down
Cost: 30/40/45/50/50 Mana 
Range: 230
Cooldown 15/12/10/9/8
Awilda swings her Axe, dealing 35/55/75/95/115 (+80% bonus Attack Damage) plus 5% of the enemy's' Missing Health as physical damage.

(45* Cleave)

(W) Unbreakable Wall
Cost: 25 Mana 
Range: 0
Cooldown 25/22/20/18/16
Awilda Is rooted in place for 1.25 seconds to block all spells damage and status effects cast onto her for the duration.


(E) Shield Bash
Cost: 25 Mana 
Range: 25
Cooldown 12/12/11/10/8
Awilda’s next basic attack (in the next 5 seconds) Stuns an enemy champion for 1.5 seconds Dealing 20/25/30/35/50 (+10% Bonus Armour) as Physical Damage.

(R)  Leap of Death
Cost: 100 Mana 
Range: 500
Cooldown 180/150/120
After a 1.2 Second delay Awilda Jumps 1275 Units before hitting the ground Dealing 200/250/280 (+20%attack damage) as Magic damage to all enemies within 500 of ….. Silencing Enemies and reducing movement speed by 80% for 2.5 seconds.

Awilda Will be rooted for 2 seconds after landing



Blood thirsty? Yes. Awilda Displays her rage using her Hatchet to cut down her foes as she moves towards her goal as an unstoppable force. Awilda has a warm heart frozen over by the Alone in the open of the Ice lands of the Freljord is Among the most dangerous of places to be for a young woman.

There have been many great battles in the Freljord in its time but great battles only bring Glory and Death, Awilda is part of the smallest clan in the Freljord known as The Winter Wind. Awilda is the Strongest Shield Maiden among them. Without hesitation she will leap into the most dangerous situations and strikes fear into anyone that opposes her.

When awilda was young her parents were claimed by the The Winters Wrath while she sat and cowered under her bed, she hid there and waited, and waited. On the third day she came out from under the bed and walked outside to find nothing but remnants of what her family once was. From that day forwards she would show nothing but bravery.

With her Father's hatchet and her Mother’s shield she thirsts for bandits blood, She shows no mercy to the evil and compassion to the good.  


‘I do not fear you,  
-- Awilda
